text.tspan: Back
Easy Exchange
Our Goal:
This exclusive feature gives complete flexibility to
our customers, in case they are not satisfied with
the item bought from our online store. They may
choose to return this product either to any of our
store in India or at our online store. If customers
exchange the product within 14 days, they can
avail 100% invoice value as the exchange value
after 14 days or they may also choose to
exchange later at any point of time at the current
market rate.
For instance,
if you buy a platinum bracelet from us but are not
pleased with the final product, you can always
exchange it from a nearby Malabar Gold &
Diamonds showroom or opt to exchange it from
our online store, malabargoldanddiamonds.com.
How to Do:
You can visit any of our stores in India and get
your jewellery exchanged. Find your nearby
Malabar Gold and Diamonds store by visiting link
store locator in footer section of our website.
Easy Exchange
Only Certified Jewellery
Product Detail Pricing
14 Days Return
Free Product Insurance
Lifetime Product
Service
Exclusive benefits when you purchase from online
MALABAR
ASSURANCE
